question: Which institution announced a scheme which enables retail participation in Government Securities market?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced that it will provide access to retail investors to participate in the Government Securities market.
The retail investors shall have the facility to open a gilt securities account with the RBI. The RBI also announced to set up a 24x7 helpline for digital payment services. It directed all bank branches to participate in CTS clearing.
